#summary Development Road Map for BigBlueButton

= Release 0.62 =

The upcoming release will include
  * A first cut at an API for integrating with 3rd party products
  * Annotations (whiteboard) in the presentation window
  * Third iteration of optimizing desktop sharing
  * more bug fixes

For a full list of what's planned see [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list?can=1&q=milestone=Release0.62 issues tagged for 0.62 release].
